Reviews.Title: A waste of money!!!
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Perez
Reviews.Content: For as much money as we spent on this phone, I am outraged that it has so many problems. Other than constantly freezing up, the charging port has stopped being able to work on any charger. We thought at first that the battery was the issue, but after spending $20+ dollars on a new battery, we found out that it was the port, itself, that was the problem. Whenever we try to connect it to a charger, its extremely loose. It wiggles around everywhere, and when you FINALLY get it to register as being connected, it'll say the battery is fully charged or for some reason says its at 14%. It'll stop charging itself in the middle of the night, and constantly go off and on saying "connect to charger" which in turn, wakes us up. I hate this phone and the lack of help we have recieved from Metro PCS, itself. We have had this phone for about 6 months. >:|

Reviews.Title: Great Phone!
Reviews.Author: Josee _268
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone from a best buy in April, and so far am very satisfied with it. Phone has a very elegant design and feels strongly built. Owned previous version admire and was very slow to respond and also while surfing the web, but 1 GHz and metro's new 4G LTE seems to fix that. Call quality is good and at a good price. Overall very satisfied with my Galaxy Admire. (:

Reviews.Title: Good 2012 Phone Replaced By Newer, Faster Models
Reviews.Author: Alan  Houston
Reviews.Content: The Admire is a discontinued 2012 phone for MetroPcs's old CDMA network which is now being replaced by a newer, faster 4G LTE network that reaches triple the cities reached by the old network.The MetroPcs website shows the new 4G LTE phones for the new network including 2014 models from Samsung, LG and Nokia.

Reviews.Title: was loving this phone until...
Reviews.Author: Barbara J. VanDemark
Reviews.Content: This being my first android phone I was enjoying it up until it started overheating and freezing up. It also would cut off in the middle of conversations. Currently I am going to try returning the phone to be fixed because the power button has stopped working correctly and the phone turns off and on without any assistance thus making the phone useless.

Reviews.Content: Not the worst phone I've ever had, but it's definitely not the best either. It was good for the first couple weeks, but it didn't take long before I was having complaints. It freezes and freaks out on an almost daily basis and drives me absolutely insane!
